pages.english: Once upon a time... there was a HUGE carrot in the ground. Grandpa came to pull it: heave-ho... it won't budge!

pages.prompt: Pixar 3D animation style, adventurous child character in striped sweatshirt standing proudly beside a large black cooking pot over glowing campfire with orange flames, holding up a smooth round gray stone with both hands showing it to 4-5 curious animal friends gathered around (rabbit, squirrel, bird, fox), hungry expressions on all faces, forest clearing setting with trees in background, 'Secret of the Magic Soup' written in glowing text in the sky, mysterious enchanting atmosphere
pages.text: Ø¨Ø·Ù„Ù†Ø§ ÙƒØ§Ù† Ø¬Ø¹Ø§Ù† Ù‡Ùˆ ÙˆØ£ØµØ­Ø§Ø¨Ù‡ ÙˆÙ…ÙÙŠØ´ Ø£ÙƒÙ„. Ø¬Ø§Ø¨ Ø­Ù„Ø© Ù…ÙŠØ© ÙˆØ­Ø· ÙÙŠÙ‡Ø§ Ø­Ø¬Ø±Ø© Ù†Ø¸ÙŠÙØ© ÙˆÙ‚Ø§Ù„: Ø£Ù†Ø§ Ù‡Ø¹Ù…Ù„ Ø´ÙˆØ±Ø¨Ø© Ø­Ø¬Ø§Ø±Ø© Ø·Ø¹Ù…Ù‡Ø§ ÙŠØ¬Ù†Ù†!
pages.english: Our hero was hungry with their friends and there was no food. They got a pot of water, put in a clean stone and said: I'll make stone soup that tastes amazing!

pages.prompt: Pixar 3D animation style, friendly rabbit character offering a bright orange carrot to the smiling child character, both standing by the steaming pot, child receiving the carrot with gratitude, rabbit looking proud to help, other friends watching in background with interest, white steam rising beautifully from pot, warm firelight on faces, generous sharing moment, forest setting at dusk

pages.english: Their friend asked: Can I help? Our hero said: I wish you had a carrot. Their friend brought a carrot and added it.

pages.prompt: Pixar 3D animation style, lively scene with multiple animal friends arriving with vegetables - squirrel carrying two brown potatoes, bird flying in with red tomatoes in a small basket, fox bringing leafy greens, child character enthusiastically dropping vegetables into the large bubbling pot, all friends smiling and excited, vegetables floating in mid-air before entering pot, community gathering energy, golden hour lighting

pages.english: Their second friend brought potatoes, the third brought tomatoes. Everyone started adding something small from what they had into the pot.

pages.prompt: Pixar 3D animation style, child character stirring the large pot with a long wooden spoon, delicious swirling steam clouds rising in beautiful shapes (hearts, stars), pot filled with colorful vegetables visible through steam, all animal friends gathered close watching eagerly with wide excited eyes, some sniffing the air with delight, magical cooking atmosphere, warm fire glow, aromatic visualization with sparkles in steam

pages.english: The pot became full of vegetables and smelled wonderful! Our hero kept stirring it and everyone helped together with joy.

pages.prompt: Pixar 3D animation style, heartwarming feast scene in circle around the campfire, all friends sitting together holding wooden bowls of steaming vegetable soup, everyone eating happily with big smiles, child character in center raising their bowl in celebration, warm firelight illuminating happy faces, stars twinkling in night sky above, communal sharing and satisfaction, the removed stone sitting beside pot, magical peaceful atmosphere with friendship and abundance

pages.english: In the end, the stone became real soup that was enough for everyone! Our hero said: See? Cooperation made the stone become the best dinner in the world!
pages.teaching_moment: Collective effort creates abundance and magic

pages.prompt: Professional Disney Pixar illustration style, nature theme, child and a beetle are friends, kindness certificate, rainbow and hearts, achievement board

general_guidelines: Always specify 'Pixar 3D animation style' at the start for consistency
Include character descriptions (age, clothing, expressions) for each scene
Specify lighting (golden hour, warm firelight, sunny, etc.)
Add atmosphere descriptors (warm, cheerful, magical, cozy)
Mention specific colors for visual richness
Add emotion keywords (joyful, excited, determined, peaceful)
character_consistency: Describe the main character the same way each time: 'toddler/child character in striped sweatshirt'
Keep supporting characters recognizable with consistent features
composition_tips: Vary shot types: close-up for emotion, medium for action, wide for context
Use diagonal lines for dynamic energy
Include motion lines for action scenes
Add depth with foreground and background elements
age_appropriate_elements: 1-2 years: Simple, bright colors, large objects, clear expressions
2-3 years: Action and humor, exaggerated features, recognizable situations
3-4 years: Family dynamics, problem-solving, cause and effect
4-5 years: Community, sharing, moral lessons, more complex narratives
